amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 8101 of the bill which prohibits the use of funds to convert any functions performed by Federal employees to private competition pursuant to a study conducted under OMB Circular A-76.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 8101 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 204 (Roll no. 501).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 204 (Roll no. 501).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Sessions.
